summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 27, 2019. It records the official inmate count (767 total) and includes a roster showing inmate assignments, including one inmate on suicide watch. This is the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held and died two weeks later.

persons.name: Davila
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 76256-054, assigned to a hospital/suicide watch category.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, recording a total census of 767 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated July 27, 2019, exactly two weeks before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
The total inmate census recorded was 767 individuals.
The inmate roster shows one inmate (Davila, REG NO 76256-054) categorized under 'HOSP' with an assignment code indicating 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.
The document is a routine Bureau of Prisons administrative record, specifically a count sheet and roster, from the MCC New York.
The document provides a snapshot of the prison population and operational procedures at the facility shortly before Epstein's death.
